              ArrayList<Crazy8.Player> playerList,

        This class should handle everything that goes on during a player's turn.
        Parameters:
        deck - The deck we might be drawing from.
        The - list of players (their hands included) we're working with.
        cardStack - The growing stack of cards.

              Crazy8.LStack<Crazy8.Card> discardPile)
        Parameters:
        userin - The scanner to read from.
        player - Our player.
        discardPile - The growing discard pile.
        Returns:
        If a card was discarded or not.

      • pacedDialogue

        private static void pacedDialogue(String dialogue,
                 Crazy8.Player character)
        pacedDialogue is a method we use that enters input and then tells the computer to wait. This makes it so that the player can notice and process the dialogue, instead of it all happening at once. Usually, .pacedDialogue() will be followed another call to this method, resembling some artificial pause in speech.
        Parameters:
        dialogue - The string to print out.
        character - The speaker for this line of dialogue.

      • helpMenu

        private static void helpMenu()
        Print out and handle user input for a series of interactive menus that offer rules, context, and assistance to players.

      • instantiatePlayers

        private static ArrayList<Crazy8.Player> instantiatePlayers(ArrayList<Crazy8.Player> playerCache)
        This class is used to offer the player input to select a character to play as, how many AI opponents they will face, and randomly select their AI opponents.
        Parameters:
        playerCache - The cache of players to take a character from.
        Returns:
        A list of players for the game.

      • dealCards

        private static ArrayList<ArrayList<Crazy8.Card>> dealCards(Crazy8.LStack<Crazy8.Card> deck,
                                          int players,
                                          ArrayList<Crazy8.Player> playerList)
        Parameters:
        deck - A collection of cards to randomly deal cards from.
        players - The number of players to deal a hand to.
        playerList - The list of players to deal cards to.
        Returns:
        A collection of hands filled with 8 cards from the deck.

      • makeDeck

        private static Crazy8.LStack<Crazy8.Card> makeDeck()
        Returns:
        A new, randomly filled deck of the four suits, 1 through Ace.
